name: StoryDice
0:
”Alexa, open Story Dice”
”Alexa, start Story Dice”
”Alexa, launch Story Dice”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: story dice
Developer Terms of Use
des: When it is time to write often times it is difficult to get your ideas flowing. Story Dice is a quick, fun way to give a spark to your story ideas. When prompted choose to roll the character, place, or item dice. Story Dice will give you a character, place or item to include in your story. You can stop there and start writing or continue to roll the dice for more ideas.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
